SEARCH
Package Controller.Panier

Interface ControllerPanierInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ControllerPanier
public interface ControllerPanierInterface
Interface for controllers that manage the shopping cart functionality within the application. This interface defines the necessary method for adding tickets to a user's shopping cart.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPanier(int idSeance, int idUser, int idOffer, int price, boolean status, int quantity, String mail)
    Adds tickets for a specified seance to a user's shopping cart, potentially applying an offer.

  • Method Details

    • addPanier

      void addPanier(int idSeance, int idUser, int idOffer, int price, boolean status, int quantity, String mail)
      Adds tickets for a specified seance to a user's shopping cart, potentially applying an offer.
      Parameters:
      idSeance - The ID of the seance for which tickets are being added.
      idUser - The ID of the user who is adding tickets to their cart.
      idOffer - The ID of the offer to be applied to these tickets, if any.
      price - The price per ticket.
      status - The activation status of the tickets (true if active, false otherwise).
      quantity - The number of tickets to be added to the cart.
      mail - The email address of the user, used for sending ticket confirmation or notifications.
